name: Two-sided
description:
This game was developed from Dec 02, 2019 to Dec 09, 2019 for a school term project. Recommend to download and play on Windows for better experience, as the WebGL version on this site may encounter lagging issues. 

General features: 

  • Fantasy ancient dungeon with modern technology 
  • Female protagonist 
  • Real-time action combat
  • 3D semi-realistic graphics
  • Custom shaders
  • Theme music 
  • Sound effects
  • Particle effects

Multiplayer feature: 

  • 2 players co-op locally 

Gameplay: 

  • In 1-player mode, player controls the main character, Cyn and a supporting character, her shade, Cyd. In 2-player mode, player 1 will control Cyn and player 2 will control the shade, Cyd. Cyn is an exorcist and an archaeologist. Since birth, she has been followed by a shade named Cyd which looks exactly like her. Cyd follows and supports Cyn in her job (Cyd can heal Cyn). 
  • Player controls the character using four-directional inputs and several action buttons.
  • Player has two combat styles: with weapon and without weapon. Each style features a normal attack and a special attack. Two styles can be swapped via an assigned action button.
  • Player can perform a roll-dodge by double-tapping the directional buttons. 
  • Player can use Artifact Detector, which is an app on the player’s smart phone to detect artifacts.

 

  • Scoring system features each player’s score. Player can earn score by defeating enemies and collecting artifacts.   
  • Collectibles include health pickups, speed pickups, and artifacts. Player can store speed pickups and use whenever needed. Artifacts collected will be shared for both players.  
  • Destructible and enemies drop collectibles. This will be randomized to make the experience more exciting and interesting.
  • Enemies perform melee and ranged combat. Each has its own health bar and combat style. The boss is an infected artifact which can summon waves of enemies.
  • Player needs to defeat the level boss and collect all artifacts in the current level in order to proceed/ win the game. Only the main character, Cyn, will be able to trigger win condition at the exit of the level. 
  • If the player/ one of the two players dies, the game is over.
